Publications and Blog Posts

Below are some recent blog posts and product manuals I have independently written.

Transparent Packet Inspection with Netfilter and eBPF | threatER

Join Jonathan Erb, threatER's Principal Software Engineer, as he explores innovative solutions in packet inspection for automated threat intelligence enforcement. Discover how combining eBPF and Netfilter can enhance network security while maintaining performance and transparency. Learn about the challenges and breakthroughs in developing a user-friendly, scalable platform that keeps your traffic safe.
